#!/usr/bin/env ruby -wKU
f = open(ENV["TM_NEW_FILE"], 'w') template = open("template.clj").read
ENV["TM_YEAR"] = `date +%Y`.chomp ENV["TM_DATE"] = `date +%Y-%m-%d`.chomp
newfd = ENV['TM_NEW_FILE_DIRECTORY'] maven_struct = /^.*(\/src\/|\/test\/)/ root = "" root = (newfd.sub(maven_struct , '')).gsub(/\//, '.').gsub(/_/, '-')+'.' if newfd =~ maven_struct ENV["CLJ_NAMESPACE"] = root+ENV["TM_NEW_FILE_BASENAME"]
if ENV["TM_SOFT_TABS"] == "YES" tab_size = ENV["TM_TAB_SIZE"].to_i tab_size = tab_size ? tab_size : 2 template = template.gsub(/\t/, " "*tab_size) end
template = template.gsub(/[$]\{([^}]+)\}/){|match| "#{ENV[$1]}" } f.write template f.close
